Story.intro-p1: It was a cold dark and rainy night. This was a town where not many people lived.
Story.intro-p2: The wind rustled as a detective stood looking at an entrance to a cave.
Story.intro-p3: "Hmmm" he thought as the rain kept falling, this was the last reported sighting.
Story.intro-p4: There had been a series of dissapearing incidents for the past few months.
Story.intro-p5: The detective was slightly on edge as he peered into the deep crevice. All he saw was darkness.
Story.intro-p6: The detective, being young and unafraid then decided to directly go in.
Story.intro-p7: "Maybe I'll be able to find some clues", he thought.
Story.intro-p8: Little did the detective know that his life would change forever...
